title: World Football Manager 2021

creator: Gold Town Games AB
descriptionHtml:
BECOME THE WORLD'S TOP SOCCER MANAGER!


Build a team with new stars and league legends to make your way to the top! Champion management of your top eleven & build a world class online soccer franchise in World Football Manager 2021. Download the game today to get a free Starter Pack!

FACE YOUR FRIENDS ONLINE!


In World Football Manager, you can play online, either together with your friends, or against them! Take them to town in the weekend social league, or team up and beat the world's top soccer manager groups!

🏆 REACH THE DREAM LEAGUE OF SOCCER 🏆


The WFM 2021 top league is called the Allstar Division. A true dream league of star soccer managers and champions, where only a handful of the top coaches will ever set their foot. Prove that you can make it!

UNIQUE LIVE SIMULATOR


In World Football Manager, you are in control of your teams tactics in each game. Swap players, add special tactics and set star formations on the fly! Counter your opponents tactics to show your true colors as a top manager! Use special match tactics such as Brick Wall or Tiki-Taka to make turnaround performances on the pitch!

FEATURES



BUILD YOUR TOP ELEVEN
Build your champion eleven by scouting & developing youth footballers as well as trading for seasoned stars! If they don't give you top performances, send them to the transfer list!

UNIQUE LIVE GAMES
Manage all aspects of the game! In WFM, you are in control of the live tactics of your team!

COMPETITIVE SOCIAL LEAGUE
In the weekend is where the hardest battles are fought! Choose to either join an existing Group or create your own football powerhouse with your friends!

IN-GAME CHAT
Psyche your opponents in-game!

MANAGE THE TALENT
Train and analyze your players! You never know who might be a late bloomer...

BUILD YOUR SOCCER FRANCHISE
Expand your stadiums facilities to ensure a steady stream of income for your soccer manager empire.

GET REWARDED
The Season Pass gives you increasingly good rewards throughout the season! The bigger the wins on the football pitch, the mightier the rewards! All managers also receive daily sponsorship packs, as well as many more types of rewards.

🌍 LANGUAGES
WFM supports more than 10 languages!

OUR COMMUNITY SUPPORT
We are always ready to listen to your input, and we want to include you as much as possible. No matter what your feedback is, you never know, your idea might make it into the game! How cool is that?
For more information, please visit:
http://www.goldtowngames.com/en/wfm/

FOLLOW US ON SOCIAL MEDIA:
Facebook: WorldFootballManager
Twitter: https://twitter.com/OfficialWFM
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/worldfootballmanager/
Discord: https://discord.gg/K2Z2arV9Cg
We love feedback so please feel free to write to us at support[at]goldtowngames.com
_______
One last thing!
Here is a link to our End User License Agreement:
https://www.goldtowngames.com/en/gold-town-games-end-user-licence-agreement/

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Improved CPU performance generally: less heat, battery drain, and shorter app load time.
Improved network performance: shorter screen load time.
Improved UI responsiveness: some faster/skippable animations, shorter interaction lockout periods, shorter screen load time.

Balance changes to the academy facility:
- Recruit list now updates once a day, but contains more players (up to 8)
- Changed progression of analysed skills and coin cost to be clearer and more directly tied to facility level

title: World Football Manager 2023

creator: Gold Town Games AB
descriptionHtml:
BECOME THE WORLD'S TOP SOCCER MANAGER!


Build a team with new stars and league legends to make your way to the top! Champion management of your top eleven & build a world class online soccer franchise in World Football Manager 2023. Download the game today to get a free Starter Pack!

FACE YOUR FRIENDS ONLINE!


In World Football Manager, you can play online, either together with your friends, or against them! Take them to town in the weekend social league, or team up and beat the world's top soccer manager groups!

🏆 REACH THE DREAM LEAGUE OF SOCCER 🏆


The WFM 2023 top league is called the Allstar Division. A true dream league of star soccer managers and champions, where only a handful of the top coaches will ever set their foot. Prove that you can make it!

UNIQUE LIVE SIMULATOR


In World Football Manager, you are in control of your teams tactics in each game. Swap players, add special tactics and set star formations on the fly! Counter your opponents tactics to show your true colors as a top manager! Use special match tactics such as Brick Wall or Tiki-Taka to make turnaround performances on the pitch!

FEATURES



BUILD YOUR TOP ELEVEN
Build your champion eleven by scouting & developing youth footballers as well as trading for seasoned stars! If they don't give you top performances, send them to the transfer list!

UNIQUE LIVE GAMES
Manage all aspects of the game! In WFM, you are in control of the live tactics of your team!

COMPETITIVE SOCIAL LEAGUE
In the weekend is where the hardest battles are fought! Choose to either join an existing Group or create your own football powerhouse with your friends!

IN-GAME CHAT
Psyche your opponents in-game!

MANAGE THE TALENT
Train and analyze your players! You never know who might be a late bloomer...

BUILD YOUR SOCCER FRANCHISE
Expand your stadiums facilities to ensure a steady stream of income for your soccer manager empire.

GET REWARDED
The Season Pass gives you increasingly good rewards throughout the season! The bigger the wins on the football pitch, the mightier the rewards! All managers also receive daily sponsorship packs, as well as many more types of rewards.

🌍 LANGUAGES
WFM supports more than 10 languages!

OUR COMMUNITY SUPPORT
We are always ready to listen to your input, and we want to include you as much as possible. No matter what your feedback is, you never know, your idea might make it into the game! How cool is that?
For more information, please visit:

BUILD YOUR TOP ELEVEN

title:
World Football Manager 2024
2.5.37

creator: Gold Town Games AB
descriptionHtml:
BECOME THE WORLD'S TOP SOCCER MANAGER!


Build a team with new stars and league legends to make your way to the top! Champion management of your top eleven & build a world class online soccer franchise in World Football Manager 2024. Download the game today to get a free Starter Pack!

FACE YOUR FRIENDS ONLINE!


In World Football Manager, you can play online, either together with your friends, or against them! Take them to town in the weekend social league, or team up and beat the world's top soccer manager groups!

🏆 REACH THE DREAM LEAGUE OF SOCCER 🏆


The WFM 2024 top league is called the Allstar Division. A true dream league of star soccer managers and champions, where only a handful of the top coaches will ever set their foot. Prove that you can make it!

UNIQUE LIVE SIMULATOR


In World Football Manager, you are in control of your teams tactics in each game. Swap players, add special tactics and set star formations on the fly! Counter your opponents tactics to show your true colors as a top manager! Use special match tactics such as Brick Wall or Tiki-Taka to make turnaround performances on the pitch!

FEATURES



BUILD YOUR TOP ELEVEN
Build your champion eleven by scouting & developing youth footballers as well as trading for seasoned stars! If they don't give you top performances, send them to the transfer list!

UNIQUE LIVE GAMES
Manage all aspects of the game! In WFM, you are in control of the live tactics of your team!

COMPETITIVE SOCIAL LEAGUE
In the weekend is where the hardest battles are fought! Choose to either join an existing Group or create your own football powerhouse with your friends!

IN-GAME CHAT
Psyche your opponents in-game!

MANAGE THE TALENT
Train and analyze your players! You never know who might be a late bloomer...

BUILD YOUR SOCCER FRANCHISE
Expand your stadiums facilities to ensure a steady stream of income for your soccer manager empire.

GET REWARDED
The Season Pass gives you increasingly good rewards throughout the season! The bigger the wins on the football pitch, the mightier the rewards! All managers also receive daily sponsorship packs, as well as many more types of rewards.

🌍 LANGUAGES
WFM supports more than 10 languages!

OUR COMMUNITY SUPPORT
We are always ready to listen to your input, and we want to include you as much as possible. No matter what your feedback is, you never know, your idea might make it into the game! How cool is that?
For more information, please visit:
http://www.goldtowngames.com/en/wfm/

FOLLOW US ON SOCIAL MEDIA:
Facebook: WorldFootballManager
Twitter: https://twitter.com/OfficialWFM
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/worldfootballmanager/
Discord: https://discord.gg/K2Z2arV9Cg
We love feedback so please feel free to write to us at support[at]goldtowngames.com
_______
One last thing!
Here is a link to our End User License Agreement:
https://www.goldtowngames.com/en/gold-town-games-end-user-licence-agreement/
